Name: Jungle Training
OtherData: You can take a tour of the former Subic Bay Naval Base and tour the converted complex, which has a number of activities on-site. Subic Bay is located on the island of Luzon, so it is an easy day trip from Manila, or you can stay in the region.
CustomerReview: I tried to contact this company several times by email and on their site. Communication proved very difficult, to the point I that I could not risk extending travel to the area on the off chance they were operating.
